Once Upon A Story
Emissions in Asia and the Pacific

Emissions in the region are high in both absolute and per capita terms. Many Asian countries are included in the top 20 emitting countries by total fossil-fuel CO2 emissions which include Thailand (Bangkok for e.g.).

Indeed, in January 2018, Bangkok experienced an issue that health warning to “at risk” residents such as children and the elderly. Additionally, Thai cities experience worse air quality than usual, causing somewhat of a mass migration to other city.
